title: How can I get more information?
description: Give a call to this number - 071 1788728 or Drop a message to sujathasanthurium@gmail.com Or you can contact us by providing us with your use case here, that way we can give our best for your time.

title: Cannot find what you are looking for?
description: Do you need a specific varient that you cannot find on our website?

title: Can I get a discount on bulk purchases?
description: Yes you can, Please let us know about your requirement.

title: Can I get some guidence on plant care?
description: Of course, Please contact us via phone or visit us. We are glad to give you all the help we can.
